pages.title: Rocky Road
pages.text: Aside from its use in crafting with the $(item)Luminous Crafting Table$(), the $(item)Resonating Wand$() also resonates with a rare type of crystal found deep underground in the $(thing)Misty World$(). While the wand allows you to locate the $(item)Rock Crystal Ore$() from the surface, retrieving it will require digging deep into the $(thing)Mist$(), so prepare accordingly.

pages.title: Finding Rock Crystals
pages.text: Holding a $(item)Resonating Wand$() at night shows lights above $(item)Rock Crystal Ore$()

Harvesting can give multiple $(item)Rock Crystals$(), which have three stats - Size, Cutting, and Purity. These stats can all be improved later.$(br)$(item)Niobium Picks$() are not strong enough to harvest these! Use $(item)Diamond$() or $(item)Manasteel$() instead.$(br2)$(item)Rock Crystals$() do not stack, so make sure you have space to carry them!
